events.message: Customer reported a car collision on April 30th resulting in significant front bumper damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the vehicle collision described.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and initiate the processing steps.
The customer received acknowledgment of the claim filing and was informed about the next steps.
Requested police report and photos of the car damage to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report, photos, and insurance information.
Investigation team initiated a review of the collision circumstances and damage severity.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision details and validating the claim information submitted.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full estimated repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover all authorized repair expenses.
The auto accident claim was closed after confirmation that the settlement payment was received and accepted.
